name: Neuroco
overview:
Working with leading multinational clients, London-based Neuroco is acknowledged as the world’s first neuromarketing agency to utilize EEG technology. The Neuroco team has pioneered neurological and biometric testing methodologies for a wide range of study areas including advertising, NPD concept and design work, packaging development, sensory testing and shopper studies.

Their work covers research and development product design, marketing communications, customer/trade marketing commissions and includes experience in FMCG (fast-moving consumer goods, broadcasting and entertainment, media and motor sectors.

acquisition.source_description: NeuroFocus Expands Into the UK and Europe Through Acquisition of Neuroco
